sections.heading: Regulation of ticket agents; penalties; redemption of unused tickets; assigning places to customers; equal accommodations; erection and maintenance of telegraph and telephone lines by railroad or railway; fences and cattle guards; liability for damages; trespass with animals; walking on tracks; pena
sections.text: Regulation of ticket agents; penalties; redemption of unused tickets; assigning places to customers; equal accommodations; erection and maintenance of telegraph and telephone lines by railroad or railway; fences and cattle guards; liability for damages; trespass with animals; walking on tracks; penalties; liability of those damaging railroad or railway property; badges of railroad conductors, baggage master and brakeman; railroad car brakes; penalties for violations of §§ 707 and 708 [Repealed].Repealed by 59 Del. Laws, c. 393, §§ 6-14, effective June 28, 1974; 59 Del. Laws, c. 397, § 1, effective June 28, 1974.
